decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly reduce their life total to zero. The deck utilizes powerful creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, supported by removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Goblin Bombardment. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides extra versatility and mana ramp. The deck also includes cards like Static Prison and The One Ring to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect its own creatures. Overall, this deck focuses on speed and aggression to secure a swift victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays utilizing a mix of creatures and spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck includes powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt for direct damage. Static Prison helps control the opponent's board while Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Arena of Glory provide additional support for the aggressive strategy. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a strong board presence to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the Ruby Storm combo by generating mana with rituals and Medallions, casting spells with reduced cost through Ral and Wrenn's Resolve, and utilizing Past in Flames to cast spells from the graveyard. Questing Druid helps ramp up mana, while Dragon's Rage Channeler provides card selection. The deck aims to quickly build up a storm count to win with a big turn involving spell recursion and explosive mana generation. The combo potential is further enhanced with cards like Wish and Glimpse the Impossible.

This Bant Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing cards like Skyclave Apparition and White Orchid Phantom to deal with threats, while also playing aggressively with cards like Voice of Resurgence and Solitude, the deck can quickly establish board control and pressure the opponent. With a focus on creature synergy and tempo plays, this deck looks to create a fast-paced and versatile gameplay experience to outmaneuver and outpace the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing cheap counterspells and card draw to quickly assemble a combo involving casting multiple spells in a turn to deal lethal damage with Goblin Charbelcher. The deck aims to win the game in a single explosive turn without relying on traditional lands, instead using mana rocks like Lotus Bloom and mana creatures like Thundertrap Trainer. The key strategy involves efficiently protecting the combo pieces and disrupting the opponent's game plan while setting up the win condition through careful planning and sequencing of spells.

This Ruby Storm deck focuses on generating a high amount of mana quickly and efficiently through cost reduction effects like Ruby Medallion and rituals to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Glimpse the Impossible. It utilizes cards like Wish and Escape to the Wilds to find combo pieces and maintain card advantage. The deck aims to chain spells together, generate storm count, and finish the game by casting a lethal Past in Flames or Ral's ultimate ability. Jegantha, the Wellspring is included as a companion to provide additional access to mana.

This deck focuses on cycling through your deck to quickly fill your graveyard with creatures, then casting Living End to bring all those creatures back onto the battlefield in one explosive turn. It also includes counterspells and disruptive creatures to protect your combo and disrupt your opponent's game plan. Additionally, it includes cards to manipulate your library and generate card advantage to ensure you have the resources you need to execute your combo efficiently and effectively.

This deck focuses on countering opponent's spells while controlling the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat. It also aims to draw cards efficiently with cards like Expressive Iteration and Preordain. It utilizes Mishra's Bauble to gain information about the opponent's deck. The deck also includes finishers like Crackling Drake and Thundertrap Trainer to close out the game. The mana base is designed to provide both red and blue mana sources efficiently, with lands like Flooded Strand and Steam Vents.

This deck focuses on aggressive early plays with creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames. Leyline of the Guildpact helps to pump up the team, while Leyline Binding and Stubborn Denial provide disruption and protection. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Scion of Draco and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The mana base is optimized for consistent color access, with fetch lands and a variety of shock lands. Xander's Lounge and Arena of Glory offer additional utility and card advantage options.
